[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(0,0,0,0.57)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” background_color_gradient_direction=”55deg” background_color_gradient_start_position=”14%” background_color_gradient_end_position=”52%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”https://switchmsp.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/managed-services.jpg” background_position=”center_left” custom_padding=”155px||155px||true|” custom_padding_tablet=”120px||120px||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”50px||50px||true|false” background_last_edited=”on|phone” background_position_tablet=”center”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ text_text_color=”#ffffff” header_font=”|800|||||||” header_font_size=”54px” background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_duration=”1400ms” animation_intensity_slide=”8%” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”44px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_text_shadow_style=”preset3″ header_text_shadow_style=”preset3″]

free assessment

Our managed services mitigate your business risks.
Get a FREE assessment today.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/it-support/” button_text=”contact us” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_button=”on” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_duration=”1450ms” animation_delay=”350ms” animation_intensity_slide=”9%” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_text_color__hover=”#ffffff”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_image=”https://switchmsp.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/it-services.png” background_size=”contain” background_position=”bottom_right” background_last_edited=”on|phone” use_background_color_gradient_tablet=”on” background_color_gradient_start_tablet=”rgba(255,255,255,0.81)” background_color_gradient_end_tablet=”rgba(255,255,255,0.76)” background_color_gradient_overlays_image_tablet=”on” background_position_phone=”top_right”][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″]

MSP – Managed IT Services 

When we say we are dedicated to small and medium businesses (SMB), we mean exactly that. We understand SMBs’ challenges and IT needs. Which is why our managed services are specifically tailored to meet the varying and fast changing IT demands of small and medium businesses from Whangarei to Auckland.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/managed-it-services/#services” button_text=”our services” _builder_version=”3.29.3″][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ next_background_color=”#ffffff” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_color=”#58585a” background_enable_image=”off” background_size=”contain” background_position=”top_right” custom_padding=”||22px|||” top_divider_flip=”vertical” bottom_divider_style=”ramp” bottom_divider_height=”100%”][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_image src=”https://switchmsp.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/managed-it-support.jpg” alt=”managed it support” title_text=”managed it support” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ border_radii=”on|500px|500px|500px|500px” border_width_all=”17px” border_color_all=”#ffffff”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ text_text_color=”#c8c9ca” header_2_text_color=”#77b856″ custom_margin=”35px||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”10px||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone”]

IT Outsourcing that works

Understanding your business strategies and objectives is our first step in building a partnership, so contact us on  0800-24-7-24-8 to arrange a free consultation or complete the form below. Then we can work together to see how we can solve your IT problems today! 

Working with an established managed services provider, such as Switch MSP, gives you access to the expertise of a larger team. We offer a variety of outsourced IT services, such as computer network architecture, maintenance and support, disaster recovery solutions, cybersecurity defence solutions and staff training, whether your business is in Whangarei or Auckland.

You’ll have all the tech support you need, at all hours of the day.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_padding=”8px||8px|||”][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_color=”rgba(228,229,229,0.35)” background_image=”https://switchmsp.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/it-services-for-small-business.png” background_size=”contain” background_position=”bottom_left”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_text module_id=”free-assessment” _builder_version=”4.0.7″ header_text_color=”#58585a” custom_margin=”55px||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”20px||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” hover_enabled=”0″]

FREE Assessment

Once we both have a clear picture of what your business needs to stay safe and keep growing, our team at Switch MSP has the knowledge, experience and expertise to deliver a full range of managed IT services. We protect businesses throughout Northland and Auckland.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://switchmsp.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/it-support-auckland.jpg” alt=”it support auckland” title_text=”it support auckland” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ border_radii=”on|500px|500px|500px|500px” border_width_all=”17px” border_color_all=”#ffffff”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ text_text_color=”#c8c9ca” header_2_text_color=”#77b856″ custom_margin=”44px||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”10px||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone”]

  • This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_color=”#58585a” background_image=”https://switchmsp.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/it-services-for-business.png” background_size=”contain” background_position=”bottom_right” custom_padding=”31px||29px|||” global_module=”1667″ saved_tabs=”all”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_padding=”6px|||||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_image src=”https://switchmsp.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/switch-msp-dark.jpg” alt=”Switch MSP” title_text=”Switch MSP” align=”center” align_tablet=”left” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ max_width=”21%” max_width_tablet=”39%” max_width_phone=”48%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_margin_tablet=”|||-24px|false|false” custom_margin_phone=”|||-15px|false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_padding=”6px||9px|||”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ text_text_color=”#c8c9ca” header_4_text_color=”#c8c9ca”]

WHANGAREI

Unit B7, 7-11 Nell Place,
Whangarei, 0110
PO Box 722,
Whangarei 0140

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ text_text_color=”#c8c9ca” header_4_text_color=”#c8c9ca”]

AUCKLAND

PO Box 217116,
Botany Junction,
Auckland 2164

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ text_text_color=”#c8c9ca” header_4_text_color=”#c8c9ca”]

CONTACT

T: +64 9 470 0600
T: 0800 247 248
E: ask@switchmsp.co.nz

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ text_text_color=”#c8c9ca” header_4_text_color=”#c8c9ca”]
